Nightligh/windlord:

Nightlight was wachting the bots who are around, she didn't feel 
fear, as she knew that she was among friends. She only stared, she 
still felt some dizzy.

Windlord turned his body and said to Aerotaur "according to pod's 
data base, she has a minimun energy level, enoguh to left stasis 
lock... she knows what's going on but she can defend herself like a 
new born kitten... may I suggest destroy the pod and move far of here?
maybe the shine might atrackt others bots little friendly "Windlord 
checked his weapons' energy level " and I haven't weapons.. "
